    Function reference

    All functions

    agg_metadata
    Aggregation metadata
    aggregation_df_cols
    PFUAggDatabase data frame column names
    aggregation_file_cols
    Aggregation file column names
    aggregation_file_tab_names
    Aggregation file tab information
    calculate_finaldemand_aggregates()
    Calculate final demand aggregates for PSUT data
    calculate_pfu_aggregates()
    Calculate primary, final, and useful aggregates
    calculate_primary_aggregates()
    Calculate primary aggregates for PSUT data
    calculate_sector_agg_eta_fu()
    Calculate final and useful sector sums and efficiencies
    chop_R_eccs() chop_Y_eccs()
    Chop the R and Y matrices
    create_fd_sectors_list()
    Compile the list of final demand sectors
    despecified_aggregations()
    Despecify and aggregate all PSUT matrices
    efficiency_cols
    Efficiency columns
    exiobase_coeffs()
    Calculate Exiobase coefficients
    get_pipeline()
    Create a targets workflow
    gross_net_metadata
    Gross and net metadata
    grouped_aggregations()
    Aggregate PSUT matrices by row and column groups
    load_aggregation_maps()
    Load aggregation maps
    output_file_info
    Output file information
    pivot_for_csv()
    Pivot a data frame for saving as a .csv file
    pr_in_agg_pipeline()
    Bundle several aggregation calculations together
    region_pipeline()
    Aggregation regions
    rename_prime_psut_columns()
    Rename "_prime" columns
    rename_suffixed_psut_columns()
    Delete original and rename aggregated columns
    sea_cols
    Data frame column names
    stack_chopped_ECCs()
    Stack chopped ECC data frames
    stack_despecification_aggregations()
    Stack all product and industry aggregations
    stack_group_aggregations()
    Stack grouped data frames
